snippet: Mr. MacPhail, a former general manager of the Yankees and the Baltimore Orioles, was president of the American League during the pine-tar dispute of July 1983.
abstract: Lee MacPhail, longtime baseball executive who became part of only father-son combination in Hall of Fame, dies at age 95.
lead_paragraph: Mr. MacPhail, a former general manager of the Yankees and the Baltimore Orioles, was president of the American League during the pine-tar dispute of July 1983.

headline.seo: Lee MacPhail, Executive Who Led American League, Dies at 95
headline.main: Lee MacPhail, Executive Who Led American League, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Lee MacPhail, 95, Baseball Executive At Center of a Pine-Tar Uproar, Dies
